article_title: Fast-Food Worker Seeks Class Cert. In Alter Ego OT Suit
article_text:
Fast-Food Worker Seeks Class Cert. In Alter Ego OT Suit

Law360, New York (September 5, 2014, 6:49 PM ET) -- A fast-food employee on Thursday moved for certification in a proposed class action that claims Sun Holdings LLC and its affiliate Sun Steaks LLC failed to pay employees overtime and required the plaintiff to work under an assumed name to avoid Affordable Care Act requirements.
